summary: Provides a suite of unit tests and helper utilities that verify the correctness of various subgraph extraction operations (edge, in/out, k‑hop, typed, masked, etc.) on both homogeneous and heterogeneous graphs within the DGL backend.
business_intent: Validate and ensure reliable subgraph functionality for graph analytics and machine‑learning pipelines that rely on accurate node/edge sampling and type‑preserving subgraph generation.
